update messages
set sendDelete=0
set receiveDelete=0
where mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: select * from messages where (sender=#{uid} and sendDelete=1) or (receiver=#{uid} and receiveDelete=1) order by mid desc;
select m.* , u.uname from messages m, users u where receiver=#{receiver} and u.uid=m.sender and receiveDelete=0 order by mid desc;
select m.* , u.uname from messages m, users u where sender=#{sender} and u.uid=m.receiver and sendDelete=0 order by mid desc;
mapper.insert: insert into messages(sender, receiver, message) values(#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{message})
